Hotel.name: Hotel London Kensington Managed by Melia (Formerly Rydges)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Rydges Kensington London in London (Kensington), you'll be minutes from London Natural History Museum and close to Imperial College London. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Rydges Kensington London. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 1076 square feet (100 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Rydges Kensington London. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Rydges Kensington London in London (Kensington), you'll be minutes from London Natural History Museum and close to Imperial College London. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

London Natural History Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Imperial College London - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
London Science Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Albert Memorial - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Brompton Oratory - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Beauchamp Place - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Harrods - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Hyde Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Holland Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16.1 km / 10 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi

The preferred airport for Rydges Kensington London is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Rydges Kensington London are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 37.8 km / 23.5 mi

The preferred airport for Rydges Kensington London is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Message.Text:
STANDARD ROOMS ARE LOCATED ON THE LOWER GROUND (BASEMENT) / LAS HABITACIONES ESTANDARD SE ENCUENTRAN UBICADAS EN UN NIVEL INFERIOR A LA PLANTA PRINCIPAL.

PRICES WITH BREAKFAST INCLUDE CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST. CLIENTS WHO WANT TO ENJOY BUFFET BREAKFAST SHOULD PAY A SUPPLEMENT. / LOS PRECIOS CON DESAYUNO INCLUYEN DESAYUNO CONTINENTAL, LOS CLIENTES QUE QUIERAN DISFRUTAR DE DESAYUNO BUFFET DEBERAN PAGAR UN SUPLEMENTO.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
